Package myLiterature

Class Literature

java.lang.Object
myLiterature.Literature
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Profitable, Takeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Book, Journal
public abstract class Literature
extends Object
implements Profitable, Takeable, Cloneable, Serializable
Abstract base class for any type of literature object Profitable Takeable
Since:
2021-05-17
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aleksandras Bileviƒçius
See Also:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Literature()
    Constructs a new empty Literature object
    Literature​(int id, String title, String publisher, int year, int count)
    Constructs a new Literature object with given values and 3 lists: "userId" for user id's that have taken this literature, "outDate" when was this literature taken by user with the same index, "extraDays" how many extra days to return a user with the same index requested

  • Constructor Details

    • Literature

      public Literature()
      Constructs a new empty Literature object

    • Literature

      public Literature​(int id, String title, String publisher, int year, int count)
      Constructs a new Literature object with given values and 3 lists: "userId" for user id's that have taken this literature, "outDate" when was this literature taken by user with the same index, "extraDays" how many extra days to return a user with the same index requested
      Parameters:
      id - identification number of this literature
      title - full title of this literature
      publisher - publishing house name of this literature
      year - year of this literatures publication
      count - number of this literatures copies in the library

    • getDaysTaken

      public long getDaysTaken​(int userId)
      Returns the number of days that passed since the user took this literature
      Parameters:
      userId - identification number of a user
      Returns:
      negative number means that extra days requested by the user exceed the number of days since taking this literature

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • take

      public void take​(int userId)
      Take this literature with default return term and save information in userId, outDate and extraDays lists, decreases this.count and increases this.userCount by 1
      Specified by:
      take in interface Takeable
      Parameters:
      userId - identification number of the user who is taking this literature

    • take

      public void take​(int userId, int extraDays)
      Take this literature with extended return term and save information in userId, outDate and extraDays lists, decreases this.count and increases this.userCount by 1
      Specified by:
      take in interface Takeable
      Parameters:
      userId - identification number of the user who is taking this literature
      extraDays - number of extra days to add to return term

    • returnItem

      public final void returnItem​(int userId)
      Deletes user information from userId, OutDate and ExtraDays lists, increases this.count and decreases this.userCount by 1
      Specified by:
      returnItem in interface Takeable
      Parameters:
      userId - identification number of the user who has returned this literature

    • countDays

      public long countDays​(int userId)
      Counts how many days have passed since return term of this literature for the user has ended
      Specified by:
      countDays in interface Profitable
      Parameters:
      userId - identification number of the user who has taken this literature
      Returns:
      if return term has not ended 0, or number of days since return term has ended
